name: Lusus Naturae
description:
A warrior has to go inside a temple in search of her sister. Inside, she discovers the curse of the temple.

Demo version made during the 10th Global Game Jam ( here it is on the site of the GGJ, with spoilers in the description: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/lusus-naturae). It is very short.

Also you need a controller to play, it must be launched with a 16:9 window ratio, and to quit at the end, just alt-F4.

Credits:

Lorenzo Biagini - Game Designer
Marco Comencini - Programmer
Noemie Scherer - 3D Artist and Animator
Sofia Bolognesi - 2D Artist
Mauro Salvador - Special
